text:
Inspired by Celeste I decided I wanted to make a crisp movement and interactive boss platformer game

Story takes place in a mystical forest where the MC (Hope) who's grieving over her dead brother tries to reconcile in the Silva forest that has a rumor within.

CC: @_buildspace https://t.co/obOwMVFPPY

user_info.name: Nick Alexander
user_info.description: Idk, just your casual rhythm gamer and nerd.
